source: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_SEQ_00<tab>Nayoshi is eager to put the wooden fishing lure to the test.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_SEQ_00<tab>イサリ村のナヨシは、擬似餌を試そうとしているようだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_SEQ_01<tab>Nayoshi is certain that the wooden fishing lure is the answer to all his problems and he is eager to give it a try. Follow him to the northeastern cliffs to make sure he does not get too far ahead of himself.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_SEQ_01<tab>ナヨシから、擬似餌を使った釣りの特訓への協力を依頼された。イサリ村の北東の崖にいる「ナヨシ」と合流しよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_SEQ_02<tab>You catch up to Nayoshi, who has already attempted to use the lure and lost his rod in the process. He explains how shortly after he cast his line, a large fish took the bait. A violent skirmish ensued, and as he attempted to reel it ashore, he was thrown into his barrel. The impact caused him to drop his rod, which was pulled into the sea. Unable to dive into the waters to retrieve it himself, he once again appeals to you for assistance.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_SEQ_02<tab>ナヨシと合流したところ、釣竿が擬似餌もろとも魚に奪われていた。イサリ村付近の海中にて「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8DC701 /var>」を探そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_SEQ_03<tab>You dive into the nearby waters and after a bit of rooting around you come across Nayoshi's rod, which has settled upon the seabed. With it in hand, you return to where he awaits you.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_SEQ_03<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8DC701 /var>を発見した。イサリ村の北東の崖にいる「ナヨシ」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8DC701 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_SEQ_04<tab>As soon as you return Nayoshi's lost property to him, he announces that he will make a second attempt with the wooden lure. After telling you he is certain he is about to catch a big fish, he casts his line. Nayoshi's enthusiasm quickly turns into fear, however, as he pulls a monster ashore.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_SEQ_04<tab>ナヨシに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8DC701 /var>を渡した。釣りを再開する準備を整えたら、「ナヨシ」と話し、魔物を釣り上げられた場合は、討伐して死骸を入手しよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_SEQ_05<tab>Having partially anticipated this would happen, you quickly slay the hooked bombfish that has appeared, and its lifeless corpse falls to the ground. Nayoshi is visibly disappointed by the results of his latest fishing attempt. Perhaps you should speak with him.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_SEQ_05<tab><var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2170C01 /var>を討伐して、<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8DC801 /var>を手に入れた。魔物を釣り上げた「ナヨシ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_SEQ_06<tab>Koruri, having seen everything from afar, approaches you and Nayoshi. She chides the fisherman, saying he must quickly dispose of the monster's remains before they start to attract other wild animals. Nayoshi decides to burn the bombfish using the broken barrel, but the wood is still slightly wet and sparks he strikes do not fully take. Seeing this, he tells you he will return to the village to retrieve dry planks and asks that you place the corpse into the cask while he is away.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_SEQ_06<tab>ナヨシと話した。コルリに指示されたとおり、壊れた樽を燃やそうとしたが燃えなかった。「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EA76F01 /var>」に、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8DC801 /var>」を置こう。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_SEQ_07<tab>The damp planks that are still smoldering from Nayoshi's initial attempts to set them on fire, burst into flames the moment you lower the bombfish corpse into the broken barrel. This takes everyone by surprise, and the three of you speculate what could have generated the fire.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_SEQ_07<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61EA76F01 /var>に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8DC801 /var>を置いたところ、消えかけていた火が勢いよく燃え上がった。ナヨシと話そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_SEQ_08<tab>You conclude that the hooked bombfish is a fatty creature and the layers of grease in its body are what caused the whimpering flames to grow into a roaring fire. Nayoshi, however, seems indifferent to this observation and simply stares down sadly at the pile of ash, where he claims his unfulfilled dreams now rest. He then declares he will never again touch a fishing rod and will be leaving the village of Isari behind for good. While he seems determined, Koruri and you are left wondering if that is truly the answer...
target: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_SEQ_08<tab>ナヨシと話した。火が強まったのは、ハリセンボムの脂のせいだったようだ。樽とともに、ナヨシの夢も燃え尽きたようで、彼はイサリ村を出ていくと宣言した。それを引き留めたいコルリは、後ろ髪を引かれる思いで漁に出た。果たしてナヨシは、新しい道を切り開くことができるのだろうか……。

target: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_SEQ_09<tab>

source: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Nayoshi.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_TODO_00<tab>ナヨシと話す

source: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_TODO_01<tab>Search the sea for Nayoshi's rod.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_TODO_01<tab>海中で<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8DC701 /var>を探す

source: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the rod to Nayoshi.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_TODO_02<tab>ナヨシに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8DC701 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Nayoshi and slay the hooked bombfish.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_TODO_03<tab>ナヨシと話し、魔物が現れたら討伐して死骸を入手

source: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Nayoshi.

target: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_TODO_05<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61EA76F01 /var>に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8DC801 /var>を使う

target: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_TODO_06<tab>ナヨシと話す

source: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_NAYOSHI_000_000<tab>Koruri can mock me all she wants but now that I have this, there is nothing stopping me from becoming the finest fisherman in all of Isari!
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_NAYOSHI_000_000口うるさいコルリに、水を差されちまったが……
さっそく、譲り受けた擬似餌で漁をしてみよう。
……例によって、恩人殿も立ち会ってくれるよな？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_NAYOSHI_000_001<tab>Let us make for the waters posthaste!
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_NAYOSHI_000_001ありがとう、恩に着るぜ。
魔物を釣り上げちまったときは、よろしく頼む。
今度は、村の対岸で釣ってみるつもりだ、行こう！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_NAYOSHI_000_010<tab><var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>, you will never believe what just happened! I could not wait to test the lure, so I cast a line with it before you arrived, and something huge took the bait!
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_NAYOSHI_000_010恩人殿、聞いてくれ！
擬似餌を軽く試してみたら、大物のアタリが来たんだ！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_NAYOSHI_000_011<tab>A violent struggle ensued, with it thrashing about wildly and me trying to hold my ground. Halfway through our silent battle, I was sent sailing into my barrel!
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_NAYOSHI_000_011かなり、長いこと競り合ってよ……。
見てのとおり、釣り上げた魚を入れるための樽を、
蹴飛ばしちまうほど激しかったんだ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_NAYOSHI_000_012<tab>The impact made me lose my grip, and my rod flew into the ocean. No doubt it is now somewhere at the bottom of the sea...
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_NAYOSHI_000_012だが、結局、競り負けて釣竿ごと持っていかれちまってよ……。
海の中を探せば、見つかるかもしれないが……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_NAYOSHI_000_013<tab>Koruri is the village's best diver. Normally, I would ask her to fetch it for me, but I am afraid doing so will only further convince her that I should quit fishing.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_NAYOSHI_000_013素潜りができるコルリに頼むか……。
いや、アイツは俺が漁をすることに反対だから、
たとえ見つけても、持ってきてくれないだろうしな……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_NAYOSHI_000_014<tab>...Do you think you could get it for me?
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_NAYOSHI_000_014とはいえ俺じゃ、泳ぎはともかく息が続かない……。
なあ恩人殿は、潜水はできるか？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_NAYOSHI_000_015<tab>Haha! I knew I could count on you!
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_NAYOSHI_000_015なんと、恩人殿は潜水までできるのか！？
す、すまないが、ひと潜りして釣竿を探してきてくれ！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_NAYOSHI_000_019<tab>I can feel it─it shall not be long until I am living my dreams! All I need is my rod, and I will have it made!
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_NAYOSHI_000_019恩人殿、頼んだぞ。
ここで漁を諦めたくないんだ……！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_NAYOSHI_000_020<tab><var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>, you are finally returned. Did you find my rod?
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_NAYOSHI_000_020恩人殿……
釣竿は見つかったか！？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_NAYOSHI_000_021<tab>Thank you! Thank you so very much!
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_NAYOSHI_000_021はあ～なんと礼を言ったらいいのやら！？
これで釣りを諦めずに済むぞ、本当にありがとう！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_NAYOSHI_000_022<tab>Now then, let us go back to practicing! You best watch closely─I am about to catch the biggest fish you have ever seen!
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_NAYOSHI_000_022早速、特訓の再開だ！！
今度こそ、大物を釣り上げてみせるぜ！
恩人殿の心の準備ができたら、声をかけてくれ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_NAYOSHI_000_029<tab>
target: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_NAYOSHI_000_029<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_NAYOSHI_000_030<tab>Are you ready?
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_NAYOSHI_000_030もしも……もしも、また魔物を釣り上げちまったら、
擬似餌を飲み込まれちまってるかもしれない。
だから、倒した魔物の死骸を預かっていてくれ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_NAYOSHI_100_030<tab>Here we go!
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_NAYOSHI_100_030でも、大物を釣り上げたら、受け止めてくれよな！
よーし、今度こそ、大物を釣り上げるぞ！
ソレッ！！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_NAYOSHI_000_031<tab>Curses! It's another beast!
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_NAYOSHI_000_031くっ……大物は大物でも、やっぱり魔物……。
しかも、なんだが妙にギトギトしてやがる……！
恩人殿、頼ってばかりで、すまねえ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_NAYOSHI_000_039<tab>
target: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_NAYOSHI_000_039<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_NAYOSHI_000_040<tab>Twice I have tried and twice I have failed. <sigh> This lure was my last hope...
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_NAYOSHI_000_040はあ……これが最後の希望だったのに……。
擬似餌は飲み込まれずにすんだけど、
2回も試して、2回ともダメってことは、もう……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_KORURI_000_041<tab>(-Furious Female Voice-)Nayoshi, it is time you faced the truth already! You are incapable of fishing anything but monsters from the sea!
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_KORURI_000_041(-怒った女の声-)こぉ～らぁ～ナヨシ～！！
また、魔物を釣り上げたのね！？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_KORURI_000_042<tab>While thankfully <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var> was here to take care of the bombfish, you must hurry to clean this up! The smell of blood will begin attracting all manner of wild beast!
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_KORURI_000_042倒してもらえたのはよかったけど、ちゃんと片付けなさいよ？
腐敗が進めば、臭いにつられて、どんな魔物や獣が寄ってくるか、
わかったもんじゃないんだから……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_NAYOSHI_000_043<tab>Very well. The corpse of this dastardly creature shall go up in flames...along with all my dreams.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_NAYOSHI_000_043わかったよ、全部焼き尽くしてやる！
魔物も……夢も、何もかも……！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_KORURI_000_044<tab>And, pray tell, how exactly do you intend to burn the body without oil?
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_KORURI_000_044え、燃やすって、油もないのにどうやって？
釣ったばかりの濡れた魔物に、火はつかないでしょ？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_NAYOSHI_000_045<tab>I will put it in this broken barrel and set fire to the wood.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_NAYOSHI_000_045釣果を入れるつもりだったけど、
壊れちまった、この樽に火をつけるのさ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_KORURI_000_046<tab>...But the wood is still damp from the water that was in it. Look─the sparks you struck are fizzling out.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_KORURI_000_046あのねぇ……ついさっきまで水を張ってた樽が、
そう簡単に燃えるわけないでしょ？
もう種火が消えかけてるじゃない……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_NAYOSHI_000_047<tab>Argh! Then I'll go and get dry planks of wood from the village, dammit!
target: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_NAYOSHI_000_047<tab>くそっ、じゃあ村のたき火を持ってくるよ！！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_NAYOSHI_000_048<tab><var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>, while I am away see that the fat fiend is crammed into what remains of the barrel!
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_NAYOSHI_000_048その前に、恩人殿！！
さっき討伐してくれた、ギットギトの魔物を、
この燃えさしの樽の残骸に叩きつけてくれ！！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_NAYOSHI_000_049<tab>I will go and fetch dry planks of wood from the village while you see that the thing's remains are stuffed into the broken barrel.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_NAYOSHI_000_049魔物なら、村のたき火で処分してやるさ……。
その前に、恩人殿が討伐してくれたギットギトの魔物を、
この燃えさしの樽の残骸に叩きつけてくれ！！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_KORURI_000_049<tab>Nayoshi has been incredibly irritable of late, would you not agree?
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_KORURI_000_049まったくナヨシったら、カッカッしちゃって……。
それにしても、その魔物……本当にギットギトね。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_KORURI_000_050<tab>Is it... Is it actually on fire!? I do not understand! That should be impossible!
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_KORURI_000_050どういうこと！？
消えかけていた樽の種火が燃え上がるなんて……！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_NAYOSHI_000_050<tab>I-It's on fire! But how is that possible? The planks were barely smoldering. Now the whole thing is engulfed in flames that climb higher by the second...
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_NAYOSHI_000_050うわわわわ！？
消えかけてた樽の火が燃え上がりやがった！？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_KORURI_000_051<tab>The sheen of water that was coating the creature's body─that must have been grease. Bombfish must be composed mostly of lard!
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_KORURI_000_051それにしても、すごい燃えっぷり……。
あっという間に、樽も魔物も黒焦げじゃない……。
妙にギットギトだと思ったら、脂だったのね。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_NAYOSHI_000_052<tab>Well, whatever the case, our worries are over. The beast has been reduced to a pile of ashes, as have my dreams.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_NAYOSHI_000_052へっ、これで、跡形もなく燃え尽きそうだな。
魔物も……俺の夢も……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_NAYOSHI_000_053<tab>...Koruri, I should have listened to you from the start. I will not trouble you, nor anyone else, any longer. I shall renounce fishing and leave the village.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_NAYOSHI_000_053コルリ、今まで迷惑かけてすまない。
俺は、金輪際、釣りをやめて、村を出ていく！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_KORURI_000_054<tab>L-Leave the village? But where would you even go!?
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_KORURI_000_054ちょっと待って、釣りをやめるのはいいとして、
イサリ村から出ていくって、どういうこと！？
逃げ出すつもりなの！？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_NAYOSHI_000_055<tab>To the mountains. Or somewhere else far, far away from here.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_NAYOSHI_000_055俺は、海が好きで、魚が好きだ！！
だから、村の誰にも負けない立派な漁師になりたかった……。
でも、俺にはその才能がないらしい。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_NAYOSHI_000_056<tab>I love the open sea and fishing more than anything. If I were to remain in Isari, I will constantly be reminded of all that I have lost.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_NAYOSHI_000_056船大工として村に残っても、漁にも出れず、
毎日、海と向き合うだけだなんて、俺は耐えられない。
だから、いっそ海が見えない山間の村にでも移り住むさ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_KORURI_000_057<tab>Nayoshi, this is madness! This is your home! You cannot simply abandon it!
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_KORURI_000_057落ち着いて考えなさいよ！
よく考えれば、もっといい解決法があるはずよ！？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_KORURI_000_058<tab>Oh, dear! Is it time already? <sigh> I must grab my harpoon and return to work. Meet me at our usual spot after I am finished. And please, for once, try not to do anything brash while I am away...
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ325_02721_KORURI_000_058ああ……もう、漁に出なきゃいけない時間だわ。
私が戻ったら、また一緒に考えましょ？
それまで、いつもの場所で待ってなさいよ！！
